name: A Short Adventure with Mio and Nami
name_original: A Short Adventure with Mio and Nami
description:
After years of the Fox and Bun tribe at constant war, their tribes came to an agreement to become peaceful and put an end to constant prey and predator aspect. Now, their tribes live at peace with one another and all has been harmonic. 

But, the wolf clan took notice of the fox clans diminish in predatory actions and put a curse upon their tribe as punishment. Now, one girl from the fox clan vows to break the curse, with a helpful hand from an over enthusiastic bunny girl member. 

This game was made in around 3 days as practice for Ren'Py + an RPG platform.
